message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.IR. 

The paper proposes a novel scheme for human activity recognition using video frames and optical flow images, which is a common approach in computer vision (cs.CV). The scheme involves generating representations and using an LSTM for prediction, which are techniques commonly used in machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI). The paper also evaluates the proposed scheme on two well-known datasets, which is a common practice in multimedia (cs.MM) and information retrieval (cs.IR) research.
